attributes.action: Terminate the Student Loan debt of individuals in England from their inception to the present day.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These are effectively a stealth tax on further education and offer little incentive to graduates to work above the 15k threshold and tax older graduates of near pensionable age from the 2nd year after graduation with unearned income such as pensions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
